text: Do you have a link to the docs about this api? Im using the new v3 api and the python sdk and somehow i cant find it :confused:
You’ll use the objectID and read endpoint to read what you want from the record I.e. message body in this case

You’ll use the objectID and the read endpoint to get/read the properties you want. You’ll feed the endpoint an array of properties and/or properties with history (if you want to see historical changes of a property as well)

The endpoint is usually /crm/v3/<objectType>/<someRecordId>/properties=<a comma seperated list of properties using their internal names>/properties with history=<another array of properties you want to see the history>
